title: Wuzhen Stay Minutes from Picturesque Water Town
description: Only minutes from Wuzhen's Water Town, Crowne Plaza Wuzhen, an IHG Hotel, is your gateway to a timeless Chinese treasure. Meander along picturesque cobbled streets, through heritage buildings and over ornate stone bridges before bargaining for succulent fruits at the vibrant water market. Refresh with a dip in the pool and relish a soothing cup of tea in the Tong Lounge before embarking on a private boat ride to be dazzled by glittering canals illuminated by moonlight.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Wuzhen, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Qingzhen Road, Wuzhen Town, Tongxiang City, Wuzhen 314501, China
